content: classic stripes in a full array of colors bring cheer to any wardrobe with extra ease this simple pullover will fit over any outfit to add a layer of warmth and style the heathered rainbow adult pullover is a seamed drop-shoulder pullover worked from the bottom up in half_double_crochet the body features alternating stripes of a main color and several contrasting colors the bottom hem sleeves and neckline are trimmed with single_crochet ribbing yarn heatherly™ sport 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 328yds/100g * mc snowflake 29545 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 hanks * c1 lilac 29534 1 hank * c2 cabana 29542 1 hank * c3 agave 29539 1 hank * c4 butter 29538 1 hank * c5 peach fuzz 29537 1 hank * c6 sweet bing 29536 1 hank
